inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientAntivirusV2_CL 
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where PrimaryAntivirusProduct !contains "Defender"
| project Computer, CollectionTime, PrimaryAntivirusProduct, PrimaryAntivirusEXE, PrimaryAntivirusProductStateCode, PrimaryAntivirusProductStateTimestamp, PrimaryAntivirusRealTimeStatus, PrimaryAntivirusDefinitionStatus,Alternative1AntivirusProduct, Alternative1AntivirusEXE, Alternative1AntivirusProductStateCode, Alternative1AntivirusProductStateTimestamp
| sort by Computer asc 
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"OTHER PRIMARY ANTIVIRUS (SECURITY CENTER) | CLIENTS | COUNT","noDataMessageStyle":5,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/4862c56b-14ba-48ce-bc14-097883eb3dab/resourcegroups/rg-logworkspaces-p/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/log-platform-management-client-p"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true,"size":"auto"}}
